summary.description:
Melanoma expression analysis with Big Data technologies.

Unified Analytics Engine for Big Data.

Apache Spark is a unified analytics engine for big data processing, with built-in modules for streaming, SQL, machine learning and graph processing.

Lightning-fast unified analytics engine.

Apache Spark achieves high performance for both batch and streaming data, using a state-of-the-art DAG scheduler, a query optimizer, and a physical execution engine.

||| NAME (Spark) SIMILAR TO (PUB. DIFFERENT) bio.tools/SPar-K (SPar-K).

||| COMMON LINK WITH (PUB. & NAME DIFFERENT) bio.tools/ArrowSAM (APACHE.ORG).

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'nCounter', 'immunotherapy', 'NanoString', 'melanoma'
summary.name: Spark
